objects.text:
ELEGANT BLUE & SILVER
TRADITIONAL BANGLES SET

• Intricate antique finish with embellished stone work
• Perfect for weddings, festivals and special occasions
• Complimentary traditional mehndi design service

product_details.name: Elegant Blue & Silver Traditional Bangles Set with Mehndi Combo
product_details.description:
• Premium metallic turquoise blue and silver-toned bangles set
• Intricate antique finish with embellished stone work
• Perfect complement to traditional ethnic wear
• Stackable design with varying widths for elegant layering
• Durable metal construction with long-lasting finish
• Comes with complimentary traditional mehndi design service
• Available in multiple sizes to ensure perfect fit
• Ideal for weddings, festivals, and special occasions
• Unique combination of modern and traditional aesthetics
• Tarnish-resistant coating for lasting shine

banner_details:
This square banner features a luxurious composition promoting a traditional jewelry combo. At the center, a vibrant product image labeled **'product_image'** showcases a woman adorned in a matching blue traditional outfit and bangles, accentuating the product's elegance. A bold serif heading, **'heading'**, is placed at the top for maximum visibility, highlighting the product's name. Directly below, the subtext **'subheading'** adds informative context in a refined font. The **'description'** section uses bullet points to communicate key features like craftsmanship and occasion suitability. At the base, the price tag **'price'** stands out in a warm accent shade, followed by a contrasting call-to-action button composed of a rectangle **'cta_button'** and centered text **'cta'**.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue Gradient: `#1a5f96` to `#0c2c4d` (background)
- Accent Blue: `#c0e3ff`
- Highlight Orange: `#FFBF7F` (for price)
- Button Text: `#0c2c4d`
- White Text: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a traditional aesthetic with a rich, elegant color palette ideal for an advertisement banner. The predominant color is a vibrant royal blue (#0072BB), featured prominently in the bangles and the embroidered dress fabric. Silver-gray (#C0C0C0) threads intricately line the blue fabric, adding a regal contrast and luxurious shine. The warm terracotta of the mehndi designs (#A14F03) beautifully complements the cooler tones, creating visual harmony. Soft pink lipstick (#E5738D) adds a subtle pop of color. Gold accents (#D4AF37) in the jewelry offer a rich highlight. The colors blend gracefully, each element enhancing without overpowering the other.
